page.title: 05A SCHOOL DAY
page.content: My first lesson was double maths . My second was english and my third was Geography. My fourth lesson was needle work which I had for all of the afternoon. At breaktime I went back to my classroom. For lunch I had 1 sandwich, an apple and a chocolate biscuit. I got home at 3.42pm. Before tea I did my homework. For tea, I ate a "daisy egg salad", which I ate at 6.13pm. After eating I did my paper round and read a piece from "THE GROWING PAINS OF ADRIAN MOLE"by Sue Townsend. My name is Alan Jarvis and I am in 4A. At 7.26 am. I got up and had a breakfast of 2 weetabix and fruit and fibre. At 8.35 I left for school and arrived at 8.50 pm. I travel to school and back by car. At home I played with my brother. Then had tea and then played tennis & watched television.
